newsitem.title: USA: Times Mirror September ad revenues rise.
newsitem.headline: Times Mirror September ad revenues rise.

text.p: Advertising revenues for Times Mirror's newspaper publishing group for the four weeks ended September 29, 1996, rose 4.6 percent to $123,942,000 from $118,460,000 in the prior year.

For the thirty-nine weeks January 1, 1996 through September 29, 1996, total advertising revenues rose 1.5 percent to $1,139,965,000 compared with $1,004,879,000 for the period January 1, 1995 through September 24, 1995.
The year-to-date results for 1996 contained six more days than the 1995 results, it said.
